content:
@Alan Mels @klonos et al Would love feedback on a possible improvement to search's UI for building the index: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4182

[UX] Remove the description above the Invalidate Search Index button. · Issue #4182 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
I like the neatness of the first screenshot that @jenlampton proposed on #1321 (comment). Placing the same warning message twice on the search settings form: and then again on the confirm page: loo...

With the PR that got merged for https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4197 the form element that allows selecting content types to limit the search indexing has been split out into node.module. I totally get that, but I was trying to achieve something like this:

[UX] Add configuration to exclude node types from search indexing · Issue #4197 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need Here is the excerpt from https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/search_index_options: The core search module scans all the available content, regardless of whether some content...
...and this change makes it harder now.
@Nate Lampton would you adamantly object in putting the code that renders the content type checkboxes back in search.admin.inc?
(perhaps I should put that in a follow-up issue in GitHab)
